sentence.cn: 当我到达时，我看到了一只2至3周大的猫头鹰。
sentence.en: When I arrived,  I saw a 2-to 3-week-old owl.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

sentence.cn: 如果您给我们您的电话号码，我们会在卡片到达时给您打电话。
sentence.en: If you give us your number,  we'll call you when the card arrives.
sentence.from: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

entry.def: When a person or vehicle arrives at a place, they come to it at the end of a journey.

example.ex: ...a small group of commuters waiting for their train, which arrived on time...
example.tran: 几个通勤者等候的列车按时到达了

entry.def: When you arrive at a place, you come to it for the first time in order to stay, live, or work there.

example.ex: ...in the old days before the European settlers arrived in the country.
example.tran: 在欧洲殖民者来到这个国家之前的旧日时光

example.ex: ...a young student newly arrived in England from New Zealand.
example.tran: 从新西兰初次来到英格兰的年轻学生

entry.def: When something such as letter or meal arrives, it is brought or delivered to you.

example.ex: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered...
example.tran: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

example.ex: Breakfast arrived while he was in the bathroom.
example.tran: 早餐送来的时候他还在浴室里。

entry.def: When something such as a new product or invention arrives, it becomes available.
entry.tran: （新产品或发明）出现，到来，问世

example.ex: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month...
example.tran: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。

example.ex: They'll be ready to embrace the new technology when it arrives.
example.tran: 他们随时准备迎接新技术的问世。

entry.def: When a particular moment or event arrives, it happens, especially after you have been waiting for it or expecting it.
entry.tran: （尤指经过等待或期盼后）来临，到来

example.ex: The time has arrived when I need to give up smoking.
...the belief that the army would be much further forward before winter arrived.
example.tran: 认为军队在冬季来临之前将会向前大举推进的看法

entry.def: When you arrive at something such as a decision, you decide something after thinking about it or discussing it.

example.ex: ...if the jury cannot arrive at a unanimous decision...
example.tran: 如果陪审团不能作出一致判决

example.ex: These figures are arrived at on the basis of dentists' receipts for 1991-1992.
example.tran: 这些数字是根据1991至1992年间的牙医收据统计得出的。

entry.def: When a baby arrives, it is born.

example.ex: It's very unlikely that your baby will arrive before you get to hospital.
example.tran: 你的孩子不大可能在你到达医院之前就出生。

entry.def: If you say that someone has arrived, you mean that they have become successful or famous.

example.ex: These are cars which show you've arrived and had a good time along the way.
example.tran: 这样的车可以显示你已功成名就，并且一路顺风顺水。

Sentence.sentence: It's important to allow readers and reviewers to see exactly how you arrive at your results.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Previously, scientists noticed pollutants arriving in the Arctic with the wind.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: One of five students arrives at college today with Advanced Placement (AP) credits amounting to a semester or more of college level work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: She failed to arrive at the airport on time.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Two weeks later, she arrived at Alaska, thousands of miles from her friends, her family and her past.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Larry arrived early for his speaking engagement
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Review his notes once he arrives in Chicago.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: M : sorry to have kept you waiting ,Madam , I've located your luggage, it was left behind in Paris and won't arrive until later this evening W : oh ,I can't believe this ,have it been to delivered to my hotel then ,I guess Q :what happened to the woman's luggage
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It failed to arrive at its destination in time
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But put a deadline on the input stage and arrive at a decision, even if it's a decision that doesn't have consensus.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Meanwhile, pupils arrive at school hungry because their families can't afford breakfast.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The scientists are breeding successive generations to arrive at varieties that incorporate salt tolerance but retain about 97 percent of the European rice genome.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"达到"之意。
means: attain ：侧重指在抱负或雄心的激励下，以最大的努力去达到一般所不及或不敢追求的目的。
reach ：常用词，指到达某一空间、时间、目标或发展过程中的某一点。
achieve ：侧重为达到目的所需的技巧、忍耐和努力。
arrive ：指得出结论，达成某项协议或作出某一决定等。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"到达"之意。
means: come ： 普通用词，含义广泛。强调到达的动作或进程，不侧重是否到达目的地。也可用于比喻意义。
arrive ： 侧重到达目的地或达到某一目标。也可用作比喻。
reach ： 既可指到达目的地，又可指到达途中的中间站。强调经过的周折或付出的努力。

means.word_mean: 1. reach a destination; arrive by movement or progress;

sentences.sentence: "She didn't get to Chicago until after midnight"

means.word_mean: 2. succeed in a big way; get to the top;

sentences.sentence: "After he published his book, he had arrived"
"I don't know whether I can make it in science!"

Sentence.sentence: A few times each year, an inspector arrived to look over the entire light station.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: A salesman who is not punctual may not make a sale if he arrives late for an appointment.

Sentence.sentence: A teacher who wants to learn on-line teaching is expected to arrive by 2:00 pm.

Sentence.sentence: Arriving in Sydney on his own from India, my husband, Rashid, stayed in a hotel for a short time while looking for a short time while looking for a house for me and our children.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: At 5:30 am on February 2, Kaasen and his dog arrived in Nome.

Sentence.sentence: At least until spring arrived, by which time they were dealing with damaging floods.

Sentence.sentence: But when I arrived at the check-in desk at providence, the lady on the desk said: "well, I'm really sorry, I've got some bad news for you-there are no fights from Washington.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: By boat is the only way to get here, which is how we arrived.

Sentence.sentence: Digital cameras arrived on the scene in 1997.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Emma, a female crane, has been in their care since she arrived in 2004.

Sentence.sentence: Finally, the day of the party arrived.

Sentence.sentence: Five minutes after he arrived, he had an emergency call and left.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Happy and calm is the man who takes all these possibilities into consideration and arrives at the appointment either early or on time.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: I was thrilled! I arrived early at byron bay where we were supposed to meet.

Sentence.sentence: If the self-centred guest arrives late, the nine others at the table set for ten will have to wait.

Sentence.sentence: If you are arriving from overseas, bring no food, animal or plant material into the country.

Sentence.sentence: Regardless of the weather or the distance, Paul Wilson will make sure low-income students in his neighbourhood arrive at their college classes on time.

Sentence.sentence: Only if the jobless arrive at the jobcentre with a CV, register for online job search, and start looking for work will they be eligible for benefit—and then they should report weekly rather than fortnightly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

sentences.cn: 达成协议；作出决定；得出结论
sentences.en: to arrive at an agreement/a decision/a conclusion

sentences.cn: 明年初该新产品就会在超级市场上架。
sentences.en: The new product will arrive on supermarket shelves (= be available) early next year.

sentences.cn: 婚礼这一天终于到来。
sentences.en: The wedding day finally arrived.

sentences.cn: 婴儿早早地出生了。
sentences.en: The baby arrived (= was born) early.

sentences.cn: 被列入布克小说作品奖决选名单后，他知道自己成功了。
sentences.en: He knew he had arrived when he was shortlisted for the Booker prize.

sentences.cn: 申请信要在10月31日前寄到。
sentences.en: Send your application to arrive by 31 October.

sentences.cn: 我们等午饭等了一小时。
sentences.en: We waited an hour for our lunch to arrive.

sentences.cn: 听说你平安到家我很高兴。
sentences.en: I was pleased to hear you arrived home safely.

sentences.cn: 开会早到 / 迟到
sentences.en: to arrive early/late for a meeting

sentences.cn: 她将在正午抵达纽约。
sentences.en: She'll arrive in New York at noon.

sentences.cn: 火车迟了20分钟到站。
sentences.en: The train arrived at the station 20 minutes late.

sentences.cn: 我来到现场时，一切都已结束。
sentences.en: By the time I arrived on the scene , it was all over.

sentences.cn: 我们很晚才回到了旅馆。
sentences.en: We didn't arrive back at the hotel until very late.

sentences.cn: 警察赶来逮捕了他。
sentences.en: The police arrived to arrest him.

sentences.cn: 今天上午来了一封给你的信。
sentences.en: A letter arrived for you this morning.

sentences.cn: 我会一直等到他们来。
sentences.en: I'll wait until they arrive.

sentences.cn: 这些数字是根据1991至1992年间的牙医收据统计得出的。

sentences.en: Breakfast arrived while he was in the bathroom.

sentences.cn: 几部让人翘首企盼的录像片终于将在这个月到货。
sentences.en: Several long-awaited videos will finally arrive in the shops this month...

sentences.cn: 他们随时准备迎接新技术的问世。
sentences.en: They'll be ready to embrace the new technology when it arrives.

sentences.cn: 我戒烟的时机已到。
sentences.en: The time has arrived when I need to give up smoking.

sentences.cn: 认为军队在冬季来临之前将会向前大举推进的看法
sentences.en: ...the belief that the army would be much further forward before winter arrived.

sentences.cn: 如果陪审团不能作出一致判决
sentences.en: ...if the jury cannot arrive at a unanimous decision...

sentences.en: ...a young student newly arrived in England from New Zealand.

sentences.cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。
sentences.en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered...

sentences.cn: 新的客人接踵而来。
sentences.en: Fresh groups of guests arrived...

sentences.cn: 几个通勤者等候的列车按时到达了
sentences.en: ...a small group of commuters waiting for their train, which arrived on time...

sentences.cn: 你的孩子不大可能在你到达医院之前就出生。
sentences.en: It's very unlikely that your baby will arrive before you get to hospital.

sentences.cn: 几个通勤者等候的列车按时到达了
sentences.en: ...a small group of commuters waiting for their train, which arrived on time...

sentences.cn: 在 1908 年到 1915 年间，大约有700万人到达美国，而约有200万人却离开了。
sentences.en: Between 1908 and 1915, about 7 million people arrived while about 2 million departed.

sentences.cn: 到达的客人们可以绕过前台，直接进入自己的房间。
sentences.en: Arriving guests could bypass the front desk and go straight to their rooms.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: Zircle 是在当天清晨到达阿拉斯加的Nulato 时报告此次袭击的。
sentences.en: Zircle reported the attack when she arrived in Nulato, Alaska, in the early hours of the morning
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 接口描述了一系列功能, 或者是约定.
sentences.en: Interfaces describe a set of functionality, or a contract.

sentences.cn: 他在两点半到达, 并被告知在要人休息室等候.
sentences.en: He arrives in 2:30, and is told to wait in the very important person lounge.

sentences.cn: 我向你保证货物一定准时到达.
sentences.en: You have my word for it that the goods will arrive on time.

sentences.cn: 贵方工厂是否根据之前提供的货物舱单信息来检查到达的货物?
sentences.en: Does your factory check arriving cargo against advance information on the cargo manifest?

sentences.cn: 汤尼和他妈妈到达了一间农舍和经过了一个农家庭院.
sentences.en: Tony and his mother arrived at the farmhouse and walked through the farmyard.

sentences.cn: 我不知他们将何时到达?
sentences.en: I do not I know when they will arrive?

sentences.cn: 消防队员在警报发出10分钟内就到达了这幢房子.
sentences.en: Firemen arrived at the house within ten minutes of the alarm.

sentences.cn: 两周之后,我们平安到达波士顿.
sentences.en: We arrived safe, at Boston in about a fortnight.

sentences.cn: 虽然有暴风雨,我们依旧准点到达火车站.
sentences.en: We arrived at the station in spite of the storm.

sentences.cn: 无论如何你必须按时到达那里.
sentences.en: In any case you must arrive there on time.

sentences.cn: 当一名警察到达现场的时候, 他仍然是清醒的.
sentences.en: When a policeman arrived on the scene, he was still conscious.

sentences.cn: 他明天上午十点到达.
sentences.en: He's going to arrive at 10 o'clock tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 他安全到达英国.
sentences.en: He arrived in England safe and sound.

sentences.cn: 我们理应按时到达(可是并没有).
sentences.en: We are supposed to arrive on time.

sentences.cn: 许多人到达美国时身无分文.
sentences.en: Many arrived without any money to their names.
sentences.from: 超越目标英语 第4册

sentences.cn: 在前一年,他们到达了现在美国的东北部.
sentences.en: They had arrived in what is now the northeastern United States a year earlier.

sentences.cn: 一些女学生当外国参观者到达的时候给他们赠送鲜花.
sentences.en: Some girl students present the foreign visitors with flowers as soon as they arrived.

sentences.cn: 他到达时我恰好在车站上.
sentences.en: I happened to be at the station when he arrived.

sentences.cn: 若情况许可同样天运输, 一旦付款到达.
sentences.en: Same day shipping whenever possible, once the payment arrives.

sentences.cn: 你们须安排此货在进口许可证期满之前到达,这是非常重要的.
sentences.en: Itimportant that you time the shipment arrive here prior the expiration of the import license.

sentences.cn: 当我到达时,他业已走了.
sentences.en: He had gone when I arrived.

sentences.cn: 我到达那时必须先打通电话.
sentences.en: When I arrive there I must first make a phone call.

sentences.cn: 他们到达时,所有的票已经售完.(过去完成时)
sentences.en: All the tickets had been sold out when they arrived.

sentences.cn: 母亲于昨晚安全到达,详情函告.
sentences.en: Mother arrive safely last night letter follow.

sentences.cn: 在学生首次到达埃德蒙顿时,安排寄宿家庭接机或出租车接送.
sentences.en: Airport pickup with homestay families or arrange taxi when students first arrive in Edmonton.

sentences.cn: 其中令人震惊的一个发现是丽贝卡·布鲁克斯对发生在她的新闻编辑部的事情几乎毫不知情,她几乎不询问相关内容,也从来不过问这些新闻是如何得来的。
sentences.en: One of the astonishing revelations was how little Rebekah Brooks knew of what went on in her newsroom, how little she thought to ask and the fact that she never inquired how the stories arrived.

sentences.cn: 卡门: 这是经常发生的事. 你不见指环送来,当时怎麽办?
sentences.en: Carman: This happens all the time. What did you do when the ring failed to arrive?

sentences.cn: 接着发生了一个问题,那就是外国使节该不该拜会这位新来的副总统.
sentences.en: The question arose whether the foreign representives should call on the newly arrived VicePresident.

sentences.cn: 只有在事件发生以后,你才能为它做出结论来.
sentences.en: It is only after the fact that conclusions can be arrived at about it.

sentences.cn: 电影明星到达时,人群中发生了一阵骚动.
sentences.en: A flurry of excitement went round the crowd as the film star arrived.

sentences.cn: 最初的台风是用它们发生的日期命名的.
sentences.en: Each hurricane is named after the same day on which it arrives.

sentences.cn: 就在我们要合二为一的时候,两个警察赶来查看发生了什么事.
sentences.en: We'd just about got ourselves together when two policemen arrived to see what was going on.

sentences.cn: 如果有火灾发生, 我会赶到那里再将人们带到安全地带.
sentences.en: If a fire accident happened, I will arrive there and take those people to safe place.

sentences.cn: 丽莎到达的时候发生了一些奇怪的事件,这使她改变了自己的某些观念.
sentences.en: Strange events immediately occur when they arrive challenging everything Liza had once believed in.

sentences.cn: 一对性情乖僻的老夫妻发生了争吵,一直闹到地窍门官那里.
sentences.en: A couple of codgers got into a quarrel and arrived ago the local magistrate.

sentences.cn: 安保力量在冲突发生后两个半小时才到达现场.
sentences.en: The security forces did not arrive until two and a half hours after the clashes started.

sentences.cn: 人们常来看看发生了什么.
sentences.en: People often arrive and see what happens.

sentences.cn: 预见到那些将来可能发生的问题, 让整个过程变得更具有适应性.
sentences.en: Acknowledge problems that may arrive in the future. Allow flexibility to take its course.

sentences.cn: 在格雷泽到来的2005年以前, 没有人能预料到发生在曼彻斯特的这场惊天逆转.
sentences.en: Before the Glazers arrived in 2005, nobody could have foreseen this bizarre reversal in Manchester.

sentences.cn: 当警察到达时, 小偷已经跑掉了. (跑掉早发生)
sentences.en: When the police arrived, the thief had already run away.

sentences.cn: "流行歌曲明星们到达时,观众人群中发生了一阵骚动.
sentences.en: A flurry of excitement went among the audience as the popular singer stars arrived.

sentences.cn: 若无意外事件发生,我们将于中午到达.
sentences.en: We shall arrive at noon barring accidents.

sentences.cn: 戈尔茨坦表示,随着越来越远海, 海洋食物网将发生改变.
sentences.en: As these creatures continue to arrive in great numbers , said Goldstein, they might ocean's food web.

sentences.cn: 无所不能因为某些事的结束而哭,应当为它的发生而笑.
sentences.en: Don't cry since arrived to an end. Smile since it happened.

sentences.cn: 摩羯啊,你渴望已久的事这星期终于要发生了.
sentences.en: The event you've been waiting for finally arrives this week, Capricorn.

sentences.cn: 相反, 他们把保险赔付的时间安排在倒霉之事发生之后.
sentences.en: Instead, they arrange for insurance payments to arrive after bad luck.

sentences.cn: 事故发生十天后, 她到达了一个印第安村落.
sentences.en: Ten days after the accident, she arrived at an Indian village.

sentences.cn: 日食将会在7月21日发生.
sentences.en: The solar eclipse is on the way and will arrive on July 21.

sentences.cn: 他们返抵美国后,由于洗脑忘记了那段时间发生了什么.
sentences.en: They arrive back in the US amnesic for the period of brainwashing.

sentences.cn: 11给我们带来的教训是很清楚的: 在没有任何警告的情况会发生新的危险.
sentences.en: The lesson of September 11 th is clear: New dangers can arrive on our shores without warning.

sentences.cn: 这些案件都发生在来自西藏的新来者之间.
sentences.en: All of them took place among people newly arrived from Tibet.

sentences.cn: 他刚到就发生了一场争吵.
sentences.en: Scarcely had he arrived when a quarrel broke out.

sentences.cn: 如果发生乱子警察马上会来.
sentences.en: The police soon arrive any case of trouble.

sentences.cn: 现在我想起来了，他恰恰在事情发生的时候到了。
sentences.en: I remember now. He arrived just at the moment it happened.

sentences.cn: 他来到纳塔尔亲自了解最近发生的激烈冲突造成的后果。
sentences.en: He arrived in Natal to see at first hand the effects of the recent heavy fighting.

Sentence.sentence: Zircle reported the attack when she arrived in Nulato, Alaska, in the early hours of the morning.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For this purpose, our schools need both the talent and the organization to educate each child who arrives at the schoolhouse door.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But nobody greeted the daughter and mother when they arrived, though the visit has been planned; nobody introduced them to the other residents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Each of the 300 arriving ninth graders are randomly(随机地) assigned to one of the houses.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Some tables will arrive on a Sunday, order a whole chicken and a shoulder of lamb or a baby pig, and just stay for hours enjoying everything we bring out for them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Has my parcel from New York arrived?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: We arrived to find a line of students waiting outside.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Everyone arrived on time, and Alex's presentation went extremely well.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet even as new roads are built, new people arrive.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C
